ðŸš€ wicketkeeper | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Protecting web forms from bots using a privacy-friendly Proof-of-Work CAPTCHA system.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Proof-of-Work Engine â€¢ Stateless & Secure (JWT) â€¢ Replay Attack Prevention (Redis Bloom filters) â€¢ Embeddable Client Widget â€¢ Configurable
ðŸ“– Summary: Wicketkeeper is a privacy-focused, self-hostable CAPTCHA system that uses Proof-of-Work to protect web forms from bots. It replaces traditional visual puzzles with a computational challenge, making it easy for users but costly for bots. The system includes a Go backend, a JavaScript client widget, and a full-stack demo application, offering a complete solution for bot protection.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ rustoku | Rust
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Solving and generating Sudoku puzzles
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Fast Sudoku solving with clear solve paths â€¢ Unique and configurable puzzle generation â€¢ Human-like puzzle solving techniques
ðŸ“– Summary: Rustoku is a Rust library and CLI tool for solving and generating Sudoku puzzles. It offers fast solving speeds, configurable puzzle generation with guaranteed unique solutions, and employs human-like solving techniques. The tool is available as both a library and a command-line interface.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ ali | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Generating HTTP load and plotting the results in real-time for performance analysis and benchmarking.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Real-time analysis of HTTP load testing â€¢ Terminal-based UI for plotting metrics â€¢ Configurable request rate and duration â€¢ Support for custom headers and request bodies â€¢ TLS verification options
ðŸ“– Summary: The `ali` repository provides a command-line tool for generating HTTP load against a target URL. It features a terminal-based UI that displays real-time metrics, enabling users to analyze performance and identify bottlenecks during load testing. The tool supports various configuration options, including request rate, duration, custom headers, and TLS settings.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ Practical_BashScripts | Shell
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automation of system maintenance, monitoring, and other administrative tasks on Linux systems using Bash scripts.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Backup creation â€¢ Disk usage monitoring and alerting â€¢ System update and cleanup â€¢ Server uptime monitoring â€¢ Service status checking and restarting
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a collection of Bash scripts designed to automate common Linux system administration tasks. These scripts cover areas such as creating backups, monitoring disk usage, updating the system, checking service status, and logging server uptime. The repository also provides instructions on how to schedule these scripts using cron jobs for automated execution.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ automation-bash-scripts | Shell
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating tasks and solving specific scenarios using BASH and Python scripts.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ BASH scripting â€¢ Python scripting â€¢ Log parsing â€¢ Connectivity testing â€¢ User creation automation
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a collection of BASH and Python scripts designed to automate various tasks. It includes scripts for log parsing, connectivity testing, and user creation, aiming to streamline processes and improve efficiency. The scripts leverage loops, field processors, and other command-line tools to achieve automation goals.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ awesome-chatgpt-prompts | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide a curated collection of prompts that enhance the use of ChatGPT and other LLM tools.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ ChatGPT prompt curation â€¢ Collection of prompts for various AI models â€¢ Community contributions of new prompts
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository offers a collection of curated ChatGPT prompts designed to improve interactions with ChatGPT and other large language models. It encourages community contributions and aims to provide users with effective prompts for various AI chat models, fostering exploration and creativity in AI interactions.
